CustomField.description: This is a Field for the Opportunity Name, which is an important field which has been systemized in the following method. YearMonthDay_Account_ServiceType (All Caps) --> 220101_NIKE_EC The Opportunity Name is referenced by Accounts Payable in relation to Vendor Bill lookups and is referenced on all Estimates/Invoices that are sent to our clients.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a Field for the Opportunity Name, which is an important field which has been systemized in the following method. YearMonthDay_Account_ServiceType (All Caps) --> 220101_NIKE_EC The Opportunity Name is referenced by Accounts Payable in relation to Vendor Bill lookups and is referenced on all Estimates/Invoices that are sent to our clients.
